name: Active Moist Moisturizer
about: What it is:A lightweight, oil-free, prebiotic moisturizer that supports the skinu0091s microbiome and provides effective hydration..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Uneven Texture, and Oiliness.Formulation:Lightweight Lotion.Highlighted Ingredients:- Oil-Free, Prebiotic Moisture Complex: Provides balanced and long-lasting hydration to oily skin without a heavy, greasy feel..Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Formulated with a prebiotic blend of plant and cucumber extracts, this sheer facial moisturizer visibly improves the texture of skin while providing balanced hydration. It applies smoothly, absorbs quickly, and will not clog pores or leave a greasy finish.
ingredients: -Oil-Free, Prebiotic Moisture Complex: Provides balanced and long-lasting hydration to oily skin without a heavy, greasy feel.  .-Lemon and Burdock: Visibly refine and smooth the skinu2018s texture. .-Cucumber: Intensely hydrates and soothes the skin. ..Water/Aqua/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pentylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Methyl Gluceth-20, Coconut Alkanes, Cetearyl Alcohol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Saccharide Isomerate, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Arctium Lappa Root Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Hedera Helix (Ivy) Extract, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Flower Extract, Nasturtium Officinale Extract, Propanediol, Polysorbate 60, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Allantoin, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Polyquaternium-10, Ethylhexylglycerin, Triethyl Citrate, Myristic Acid, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Lavandula Hybrida Flower Extract, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Aminomethyl Propanol, Citral, Linalool, Limonene.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing and toning, apply to your face and neck with light, upward strokes. .-Use twice daily, morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was drawn to 'Active Moist' due to its many fantastic plant-derived ingredients. My first attempt at applying it was on a morning. Bad idea! I found it did not sink into my skin at all and just sat there, making any sunblock applied over it an impossible task, let alone makeup. I found this unusual as the product is supposed to be oil-free. Thinking I had perhaps applied too much product, I removed it with a makeup wipe and applied even less this time around, but the effect was the same, albeit less pronounced. The next time I applied it was on an evening, at the end of my cleansing routine. This for me was more ideal as I had no other products to apply over this and could let it sink in (or so I thought) overnight. Unfortunately it didn't really sink in. What I liked about Active Moist the most, apart from ingredients, was the fact that it did not cause any adverse reactions - breakout, itchiness etc. It hydrated fairly well too, but I feel a lot more could be done to improve the formulation so that it doesn't sit on the skin and absorbs more easily.  ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: u2018Peter Thomas Rothu2019 u2013 Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: u2018Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. Lip Balm: u2018Nuxeu2019 u2013 Reve De Miel Lip Balm 7. Lip Liner: u2018Sephora Collection' - Rouge Gel Lip Liner

reviews.review_title: Absorbs well and no greasy feeling
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer complimentary from Dermalogica to try and review. I am on my second tube of this Dermalogica Active Moist oil free moisturizer and I really like it a lot.  I have oily skin and frequently have issues getting moisturizers to absorb into my skin. Many just sit on the surface and donu2019t actually penetrate and sink in to actually do what they need to do.  Active Moist absorbs into my skin so well and doesnu2019t leave a greasy feeling behind.  Dermalogica gets bonus points for being cruelty free and made in the USA!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The  Active Moist cream was gifted by Dermalogica for reviewing purposes, and it did not disappoint. I love how fast the lotion absorbs. It leaves it soft and hydrated.  I also enjoy that it doesn't have a strong scent.  It is on the lighter side, so perfect for my combination skin. But drier skin types might need something a little more substantial.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dermalogica active moist is hydrating, nourishing, glides on smoothly, but leavings a slight tackiness on my skin. Its a nice moisturizer for the autumn season, a little bit goes a long way. Itu2019s a gel cream texture with a slight scent. Thought itu2019s a gel cream texture it had a good enough hydration for autumn season. For the winter months, may need to layer for a bit more hydration. Complimentary from Dermalogica.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was received complimentary from Dermalogica.  This is another HIT from Dermalogica! I have combo skin and this keeps my oily section under control while my dryer spots stay hydrated and moisturized.  My skin feels plump and looks juicy! 10/10 recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an oil free moisturizer that provides an extra boost of hydration. It is loaded with so many skin boosting ingredients to moisturize and retain moisture in the skin - Butylene Glycol and hydrolyzed jojoba esters. The moisturizer is a white color with a creamy texture. This does leave a slight tackiness, but it will absorb right into the skin after 30-60 seconds so I prefer to apply this to damp skin before applying my serum u2013 cleanse, tone, serum, tone, moisturizer. This way it better helps the skin absorb the product. If you want it to absorb even better sometimes, I apply toner or mist afterwards. After using the moisturizer my skin does feel more hydrated, making this a good moisturizer for the colder months. The cream has a light fresh scent which is quite refreshing.  Gifted by Dermalogica in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product!! Perfect for your winter skincare routine.  I use this everyday and it leaves my skin feeling soft. I suffer from very dry skin so Iu2019m so glad I found this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dermalogica is a big part of my skincare routine  and I was very excited when they gifted me t the Active Moist moisturizer for my honest opinion. The packaging as usual is very presentable and the product comes in a box.  You get a huge amount of product 100ml when most face creams and serums are only 30-50 ml . The cream it self is very light and immediately leaves my skin very  soft and smooth. Little bit goes a long way. I love the combination of nature and science- the formula has probiotic complex and mix of botanical extracts.  It absorbs very quickly without any residue and I can use it under makeup as well without any cakiness on the skin.  The smell is OK, very light citrusy scent  and is the only thing I would change to make perfect.  Overall excellent product and other big hit from Dermalogica family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I have a combination of acne-prone skin so I hate the feeling of having a very thick layer of any type of product to feel hydrated but this one does not fail me. It's perfect for the winter.  *Gifted by Dermalogica

reviews.review_title: A great match for my sensitive combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Active moist is such a nice, lightweight yet hydrating moisturizer. It smells subtly like lavender, which gives me that spa feel without being overwhelming or irritating on the skin. I always come back to dermalogica moisturizers since by skin really loves them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this, as moisturizers are always something I feel like I canu2019t have too much of. I was sorely disappointed because I will never be using it again. It felt lightly moisturizing, but I had to end up washing it off because I couldnu2019t stand smelling my own face. Dermalogica, PLEASE fix this.   Gifted by Dermalogica.

Gifted by Dermalogica. A great moisturizer. I feel like this would be better for the spring and summer for my combo skin. I live in an area that is cold and dry and I need to layer this with something else to keep my skin hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

My skin can get especially dry in the winter so I need that extra hydration. It feels so luxurious and effortlessly gives me that glass skin effect. I use it in combination with vitamin c to brighten and clear up my breakouts. It is a smooth application and keeps my acne prone skin happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this moisturizer that I receive complimentary from Dermalogica! First off, I really enjoy that itu2019s a squeeze bottle vs jar. I plan to cut open the tube to get at any remaining inside and put it in a travel size airless pump I got on amazon. reviews.review_text: Hey Beauties!!   #DermalogicaGiftedMe this fabulous Active Moist and I'm in love! Key Benefits: Hydrates with no oily shine through a botanical layer on skin and balances skinu2019s microbiome as well as refines skin with botanical extracts.   Key Ingredients: Prebiotic Moisture Complex containing Hyaluronic Acid~ Combines prebiotic system with plant extracts, forming a botanical layer on skin for long-lasting hydration, improved skin texture, and a healthy microbiome.   Lemon and Burdock Extracts~ Helps refine skinu2019s texture.   Cucumber Extract~ Soothes skin and helps provide deep hydration.   After cleansing and toning, apply over face and neck in light, upward strokes. Use twice daily, morning and night.  This product is formulated with clean and safe ingredients is, noncomedogenic, vegan, gluten free, paraben free, sulfate free, phthalate free, synthetic fragrance free,  cruelty-free.  Plus the packaging is recyclable.   This is my new favorite moisturizer. I love that it's noncomedogenic, so it doesn't clog my pores. It's super soothing and gentle on my sensitive skin and absorbs quickly and easily without leaving any sticky or greasy residue behind. I also love that it has no scent to it. And thirdly, the thing that surprised me the most with this product and LOVE: It is so unbelievably lightweight on the skin, immediately soaks into the skin and soaks in matte!!! I love that! Also love how it's non greasy and takes almost no time to soak in, so you can run out the door and not look like a greasy, overly-dewy mess if you're in a rush. I will absolutely get this again. This would also work very well for those with acne prone skin(like myself), or those who have naturally oily skin who may skip moisturizer all together, try this! It's a game changer for sure.

Cons: I have combination skin and, while this is objectively hydrating, it wasn't enough for me. I used this on my neck and could definitely see a difference, but I definitely needed to layer this with an SPF moisturizer during the day and a facial oil at night. If you have really broken skin, I would probably skip as the burning would be too intense. I had a scratch on my face and this moisturizer didn't feel so great on that part.   I think if you have oily skin, this could be a great moisturizer for you! Or if you have an SPF you use that isn't super hydrating, then combing it with this product could be useful.   I got this product as part of a sample program, and overall, I would recommend and purchase this product.

reviews.review_text: I very much loved this moisturizer, when I got the chance to try this I was actually looking for a good oil-less moisturizer for after my skin care daily routine. What I like most about the product is that a little goes a long way, I literally only use a small pea sized amount for my whole face and include my lips as they can get dry. Other things I like about the product is that it is completely oil-less and very light, it stays true to those two statements, it has natural extracts from fruits and it has prebiotics, some of which I plan to keep on adding to my skin care. I love this product enough to want to buy again and I would recommend it to friends looking for a light oil-less moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a game changer for me.  For years I've been convinced I had dry skin and slathered on every thick product I could (silk cream, argan oil, etc) but started to have break outs.  I had a dermatologist suggest that what I needed was hydration rather than a thick layer of product.  I started using active moist twice daily and at first wasn't sure about it because I was so used to the feeling of heavy products and this is quite light and fast absorbing.  But after a few weeks I realized this truly balanced and hydrated my skin.  The break outs have stayed away and my skin always feels hydrated, even right after I wash it. It has really changed my skin.  I haven't used this in the driest winter months yet however, but in the summer/fall this has been flawless.  Another plus is makeup layers very well over this moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as part of the Normal/Oily Skin Kit. It is very fast absorbing, smells nice (like a light essential oil), is not greasy at all, and perfect to wear under makeup. However, it is a very light moisturizer and ultimately I do not think it is super moisturizing. If you have normal/oily skin like I do, I think you'd like this. If you are very dry I am not sure you'd find it provides enough moisture. Overall, I really like it for my skin type and I will continue to use it for my morning routine, but I will use a different, thicker moisturizer at night. Would repurchase though!
